name: CryoFall
description:
CryoFall is Sci-Fi multiplayer survival game set on a forgotten planet in a distant future. This unique multiplayer sci-fi experience challenges players to survive on a harsh, alien planet with a variety of official and community servers hosting persistent worlds for up to 300 players each. CryoFall features top down perspective with hand-drawn 2D graphics.

CryoFall delivers a complex survival experience with unlimited opportunities for players to make their own mark on their world. Discover new ways of farming, hunting, cooking, crafting, mining, building, and trading, with multiple specializations available per character. The challenges of staying alive push players to choose between working collaboratively with each other to build a functional new society in an effort to learn the secrets of this hostile alien world, or succumb to the most basic of urges and try to take what others have worked so hard to build.

But exploration is also critical. Ensuring the survival of your newfound society rests not only on you and your fellow players but on the strange new world around you: a dangerous landscape full of hidden labs to unearth and exotic alien lifeforms to harvest and fight.

name: Jelly Bomber

After the game starts, your enemy headquarters is opposite and must be completely destroyed by the enemy tanks in the shortest time. If the enemy tanks are not destroyed in the prescribed time, more and more tanks will appear and the difficulty will be improved.Take control of your tank, which has two weapons, bombs and machine guns, and choose the right weapons to destroy your local tank units, while trying not to get hit by local weapons. 
W : upward 
S : down 
A : left 
D : right 
Q : switch weapons

In a desperate bid to destroy the AI, humanity utilized orbital weapons to obliterate the earth. The remnants of mankind are scattered across the solar system. It is up to you to rebuild order and civilization.

name: Rocket Swords

CLOWNS ARE FALLING FROM THE SKY! KILL THEM ALL! 
 
You must destroy them. Do not relent. Do not give them quarter. 
 
FLY THROUGH THE AIR USING A UNIQUE MOTION SYSTEM, NEVER BEFORE SEEN IN VR!

name: Food Bomber
description: A flight shooting game with funny and horror elements. Beautiful and strange masters of nightmare are wating for you.

name: Don't touch me

Don’t touch me is a fast paced third person experience where the goal is to not get touched by any zombies, while Also navigating numerous fun maps, with zombies coming your way. The game is split with 6 survival maps and an Arena mode, split screen multiplayer, and online leaderboards and so you can try to be the best in the world! 
Made in the unreal engine by a solo developer

name: Plunder Squad

name: Elven Magic: The Witch, The Elf & The Fairy

A Game about Elves and Witches. Elven Voices delves deeper into Fae the elven witch's apprentice and there endless struggle to recover their lost spell book from Earthen Lands without drawing any attention to themselves because this is strictly forbidden by the Elven Elders.

The story continues into another world and there are many twists and turns for Fae the Elven Girl and the Witch named Ellen that would have Fae be her apprentice to uncover. The imperial guard of the nearby capital city may prove difficult to avoid. It details the rise of a Wyvern Wraith and the plight of a Witch Wraith.

This Game is an RPG Game and its game play is like WOW in that the game has levels of gear and it also has great graphical terrains of desert scenes and beach scenes.

name: O2Jam x DancingParty

FPS VirtualReality game that draws patterns of notes that fly with rhythm and timing 
 
This game is a rhythm game that hits the ball at the exact moment. 
 
Let's play with the dancers in front of us to the rhythm. 
 
Let's play rhythm games with our bodies!

name: Street Heroes
description: Sin descripción

description: Your best friends will be your reflexes and your wits on this crystalline adventure!

name: Ero Date
description: Match 3 at the time with cute girls.

name: Ape Hit
description: What happens when it’s your first day on the job, your boss is an angry ape and there is no operator's manual? Embrace the chaos... go Ape Hit!

name: Lot'zAmonsters
description: An arcade wave game, shoot, kick upgrade and eat watermelons.

name: Endless Jade Sea: Midori no Umi
description: A suspense with a twist, this game is made by Cabbit, sister brand of SkyFish. The special touch of the female screenplay writer has brought this game to a whole new level. A group of youngsters, who suffered from memory loss, got lost in a mansion in the woods. What will their fate be?

name: Welcome to Bummertown
description: Welcome to Bummertown a place where You'll have to collect items, talk to colorful characters and solve puzzles in order to find a lost character named Bedford.

name: Test your knowledge: Dogs
description: Is a test game that will test your knowledge of different breeds of dogs. Do you know what a variety of dog breeds look like? German shepherd, Labrador Retriever, English bulldog, Poodle, Golden Retriever, Chihuahua, and many others. Test yourself with our interesting test

name: Grizzly Adventure
description:
Travel through the woods and solve logical puzzles with the Grizzly Bear. Beware of enemies and catching rabbits. Multiple game modes and many levels. 
 
Mode for children: catch rabbits, move objects and get out of the woods. 
A logical mode: a wreath of logical puzzles and interesting levels that will be difficult to pass even by an adul

name: Legend of Assassin: Siberia
description: An exciting platform game about the adventures of an assassin in Siberia. Jump over obstacles and collect crystals, and try to survive in this adventure.

name: Witch Blood
description: Witch Blood is an FPS horror - adventure game that focused on reversing a curse of the 18th century village which you are living in. Discover the living forest and experience the horror that you are in.

name: Dungeon Kitty
description:
This is a minimalist leisure adventure game.
We use simple operations to let cute cat warriors avoid traps in underground cities to collect gold coins.

name: Mmmmmm... Cake!
description: Littile Cake need to escape from this world. Use your mouse to jump across the obstacles. Can you help him, please?

name: Operation Lone Wolf
description: Operation Lone Wolf is a multiplayer & soon to be Singleplayer first person shooter, set in the second world war. You can play with up to 10 players, in different free for all gamemodes. At the moment this game has 8 gamemodes, including: standard free for all, gungame, sniper, shotgun and pistol-only and more. You can play on 10 different maps, set on all kinds of locations. Operation Lone Wolf has small maps, and big, more open maps so there are many gameplay options available for the players. This game is not trying to be a realistic representation of WW2, but more of an arcade, fast paced shooter, in which having fun is the main goal. Post launch updates like new maps, new gamemodes etc. will all be free, and there are no in-game purchases in Operation Lone Wolf. The game will cost around $17 at launch.

name: Pixel Express
description: Your new favorite game about trains! Or not...

name: Fear for Sale: City of the Past - Collector's Edition
description: The eyes are watching... and they're everywhere.

name: Mystery of the Ancients: Curse of the Black Water - Collector's Edition
description: Uncover Poseidon’s ancient secrets hidden under the town of Black Water!

name: Death and Betrayal in Romania: A Dana Knightstone Novel - Collector's Edition
description: Can you escape from the grasp of a lovestruck ghost?

name: Farmer's Fairy Tale
description: Take on the role of an exceptional heroine, set up your own farm, solve exciting quests and discover a mysterious fairy-tale realm. Let Farmer’s Fairy Tale enchant you! Begin your great adventure and play for free!

name: Achromatic
description: Achromatic is a minimalist puzzle game about connecting dots in order to transform them all to one cohesive color. Along the way you will uncover unique dots with exciting properties to assist you on your puzzling adventure.

name: Roman's Christmas: A Furry Detective Game
description: Roman, the wolf-kind detective plans to spend his Christmas vacation in his favorite tavern, but a murder case happened in the tavern put him to work again.

name: Bloody Rally Simulator
description: What goes sideways and kills people? A rally car! Bloody Rally Simulator will allow you to compete in fun racing events where show doesn't stop if one or two people from the audience get hit. Grab a couple of controllers and invite your friends over for a bloody split screen racing madness!

name: Space Fox Kimi
description: Space Fox Kimi is a RPGmaker space adventure game following the career of the titular Kimi as she rises through the ranks of the Galactic Foxian Empire Navy.

name: Terrorist Apartment
description:
In this game, you can use different kinds of weapons, such as machine guns, small pistols, axes, etc. Props can also be used, such as cameras, flashlights, etc. Destroy any zombies you encounter, and keep your health alive.You will be alone in a dark, scary building, find supplies and weapons in the building, be aware of the zombies you encounter, and strive to grow and eliminate them.Please note that you need to attack the head, body, and lower body of a zombie to kill it completely. 
WASD control 
Tab backpack 
Left mouse button shooting, right mouse aiming, moving mouse control perspective

name: Master of Rogues - The Seven Artifacts
description: Dungeon-Crawler, Roguelike-like RPG

name: Puzzles for smart: Dogs
description: A fairly simple, educational game. Assemble the puzzle of dogs from certain parts of the picture. The game of puzzles will seem to your child very fascinating as he will gradually achieve that he wants to see rather

name: Amaze ABC
description: Amaze ABC is a straightforward and surprisingly - difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with abstraction art and calm soundtrack.

name: Axe Throw VR
description:
You've got a HTC Vive and some cool motion controllers, but what can you really do with them? Throw some virtual axes! 
 
In Axe Throw VR, a virtual axe throwing range becomes your playground!

name: Cybarian: The Time Travelling Warrior
description: Cybarian the time travelling warrior is a classically inspired arcade action game, with a mixture of modern and retro gaming tropes.

name: PsyBurst
description: Psyburst is an action side scroller, featuring 8 unique characters with many different skills. It's a hybird between sidescroller and fighting game. Play as hunters and slash your way trough your opponent.

name: CrazyDriving
description: Crazy Driving is a racing game with normal cars racing against time.

name: Starcom: Nexus
description: Suddenly thrown into an unknown galaxy, you must explore, fight or befriend aliens and transform your ship from a small survey vessel into a powerful battlecruiser to unravel the mystery of the forces that brought you here and find your way home.

name: Huge Enemy - Worldbreakers
description: Huge Enemy - Worldbreakers is a side-scrolling Shootem'Em Up that takes place in a rich environment designed in Full HD. Immerse yourself in a Dark Sci-Fi universe with Japanese influences.

name: Arc Savior
description: Discover a beautiful and brutal universe through three immersive stories. Champion blazing fast dog-fights, Out wit aggressive defense systems and overcome constant overwhelming odds. This is your goal, this is your duty, this is your way of life...

name: Double Shot
description: The perfect blend of bartending, shooting and the 80's come together in virtual reality. Doused in neon and riddled with bullets, will you survive your shift?

name: Galactic Dominion
description:
Galactic Dominion is a quick paced 4x space strategy game available in either Real-Time or Turn-Based mode.
Explore the stars, perform research, manage your colonies, build a fleet, and conquer the galaxy!
Play through an epic space campaign or alternatively customize your games for infinite re-playability!

name: Mystery Trackers: Black Isle - Collector's Edition
description: When a journalist is kidnapped after beginning an investigation, it’s up to you to learn the truth behind Black Isle.

name: Living Legends: Wrath of the Beast - Collector's Edition
description: Help Goldilocks's son protect his village from invading bears!

name: Sally's Studio HD
description: Sin descripción

name: Queen Elsa and Her Horse Girl Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Seul (Alone): The entrée
description:
Seul Alone is a text based choose your own adventure and philosophical thriller with horror elements. A subsistence where characters dwell. There are mysteries to solve and connections to unfold. Journey through here but remember you may not stay.
Can you save Peggy?

name: Metori
description: Strategize, build, and upgrade your fleet to defeat your enemies. All filtered through the design of classic arcade games.

name: WarPods
description: Sin descripción

name: Wake Up, Good Guardian!
description: Wake up, save some spirits, befriend some elves, give some gifts, thwart all evil. Y'know. Just guardian spirit stuff.

name: 360 No Scope!
description: 360 No Scope is a fast pace shooter that requires skill and accuracy. Take the fun and chaos of insta-gib with the only way to get ammo is by doing a 360, plus ability to run on walls, ceilings, and you get a fun chaos deathmatch experience.

name: Fantasia Sango 5
description:
*** This Game is only available in Chinese ***

The time and space background of "Fantasia Sango 5" occurred in the late Three Kingdoms period, when Cao Cao and Liu Bei had both died, but at this time Cao Pi in the north had already ascended the throne, and Sima Yi was the right and left hand to actively expand his power; Liu Chan in the southwest had also been assisted by Zhuge Liang. Immediately. In such a new atmosphere of the Three Kingdoms, the protagonist of this generation of games has quietly appeared in a small village on the southwestern border of Shuhan...

name: Geocells Tricells
description: Tricells is a tranquil logic puzzle game and is the first game in the Geocells series.

name: Sweeper Zero
description: They still come! Alien base is invaded by alien species. As the last hope of mankind, take up your arms, sweep them out !

name: Shooter Game
description: Shooter Game is a Multiplayer FPS . Fight in various maps with different weapons in both single and team death matches .

name: Foto Flash 2
description: Attention shoppers! The sequel to everyone’s favorite sexy scavenger hunt game is here! Can you save a dying mall by making a pin-up calendar?

name: Bounty Battle
description: Bounty Battle is the indie fighting game -- a new multiplayer 2D fighting game, where you can square off as your favorite indie hero against other indie heroes from games like Guacamelee!, Darkest Dungeon, Dead Cells, and Psychonauts 2 among other awesome indies. The game features more than 30 character, each with their own companion Minion and unique abilities. It’s Super Smash Bros. meets indie games where you battle across levels inspired from indie game worlds with up to 4 players

name: Sampling
description: Sneak-Sample-Morph-Fight-Hinder-Rescue-Hide-Escape.

name: Radio Commander
description: Use the radio to give commands to the soldiers on the battlefield. Keep track of the situation based on their voice reports only. Lead US platoons to clash with Vietcong in a realistic, innovative approach to the RTS genre. Make hard choices in a narrative driven experience, and face the outcome.

name: ZoomnBoom
description: In ZOOMnBOOM, you zoom and boom. But doom and gloom loom for those who oppose you! ZOOM around two gravity-defying arenas and make your three opponents BOOM into the wall of light that trails behind you! Try to be the last one zooming in split-screen battles with up to four players!

name: Don't Look Down
description: A VR climbing game with enemies, power-ups, and bonus rooms.

name: BattleRush 2
description: BattleRush 2 is a multiplayer large open-world shooter in the entourage of the Second World War with total destructibility of the environment.

name: Urbance Clans Card Battle!
description: Street gangs rise up in Neo-City. Time has come to gather your own gang to take over the whole city, district after district. Takedowns will happen, show no mercy if you wanna survive.

name: Good Girl
description: Find differences in two pictures.Unlock five stages to get five charming pictures and twenty-five female sounds.

name: Princess Lili
description: A text adventure put into a RPG with puzzle elements, adapted from the Chinese edition of La Traviata.

name: How to Date a Magical Girl!
description: You're invited to the elite academy for magical girls! Will you take the opportunity to make new friends? Learn magic? Or... Will you try and date a cute magical girl?

name: Top Down Racer
description:
Buckle up and hit the gas!

Beat the time records and compare your high score with all players worldwide.

name: Synthwave Dream '85
description: Neons, extreme speed, drifting, arcade scoreboard: everything an '80s stereotypes lover needs

name: Idle Hunter
description: Idle Hunter - is an Idle game made for people who like to relax and to grind a lot!

name: Drakkar Crew
description: Hey rookie, climb aboard! We're heading for adventure across the North Sea on our reliable Viking ship! Choose from one of the charismatic characters, hire some warriors and engage in bloody battles!

name: Hentai Girl
description: Relax class puzzle game to keep you in a good mood

name: TapRPG: The Second One
description: TapRPG is back and this time with a side-kick to help you hack, slash, loot, level up, and wipe the evil from the land. A retro 2D style RPG that is part exploration, part action hack and slash.

name: Ammo Pigs: Armed and Delicious
description: It's the year 2049. Slaughterhouse A.I. controls the surface of the Earth, turning all life into sausage. Only the pigs remain to fight.

name: Samurai Wish
description: Based on the japanese folklore of the "wish trees", become a member of the Wishmakers' Clan. Defeat your enemies brutally with your katana or your shurikens to fulfill people's dreams.

name: Degeneration
description: We smell degeneration in every single day of our life, we see it. We speak degeneration and we touch it. We are living the degeneration. But that is not what it is supposed to be.

name: Wishes In Pen: Chrysanthemums in August - Otome Visual Novel
description:
A girl from modern Tokyo has slipped back in time and right into the end of an era: 
The final throes of the Tokugawa Shogunate and the war it brought with them. 
With lives, her survival, and her heart at stake, will this 21st century city girl find a way back?

name: Nocturne of Steel
description:
Become humanity's blade, the Avatar of Steel, & fight against the Elemental Gods while searching a lonely, defeated world for the lost soul of love.
Level up your skills, & discover various items and abilities to help you survive in this retro 2D action-adventure indie ode to the Metroidvania and Souls genres.

name: Cadria Item Shop
description: Cadria Item Shop is a casual simulation game with fun plots. In the silent town you are just a shopkeeper to craft items and weapons for heroes. You can sell your items to heroes and complete orders to earn gold coins. By managing and developing your item shop you will help to reconstruct your hometown.

name: The Magician's Burden
description: Romance cute villagers, banter with the annoying demon inside your head, and finally confront your tormentor in this epic interactive fantasy novel.

name: Ayni Fairyland
description: Adventure in the fantasy world

name: Noble Armada: Lost Worlds
description: Noble Armada: Lost Worlds is a real-time strategy PC title based on the Noble Armada miniatures game. Set in the Fading Suns Universe, where the suns themselves are dying, humanity battles to revive its lost greatness, or just take what is left. The five great Royal Houses dominate human space as they battle each other for control of the greatest resource... humanity itself.

name: Roguelike Hero
description: Roguelike Hero is an action game inspired by classic comedy action movies. You play as a shameless nobody but owns an ambition to become a great actor. Full of memes and silly details, the game presents a trolling action experience.

name: Tree
description: Tree tells a story of a relationship between a boy and his tree. What starts off as a simple connection, over time it grows into something deeper.

name: My Farm
description: You start with just a hen, an empty field and a few pennies. You have to feed your hen, take care of it and improve its living conditions! The aim of the game is to earn money by selling eggs and other farm produce, in order to buy more animals at the Farmers' Fair, and items that improve your farm from the Shopkeeper.

name: BoxRunner
description: BoxRunner is a classic style arcade game that challenges you and your trusty robot 'Mr. Doo-Dad' against the clock. How many boxes can you and Mr. Doo-Dad open before Mr. Doo-Dad's battery runs out?

name: Takeout food
description: As a handsome male college student, he took part in the summer vacation to give away the takeaway, but opened the door to the new world. Beautiful and lonely women, professional women, restaurant owners, beautiful students.

name: BrutalAliens
description: BrutalAliens is a game about invasion of alien space colonies, you are equipped with heavy weapons, soldiers troops and tactical skills. You have to eradicate all the alien race called Vorganoidz from the galaxy.

name: DomiCard
description: Play Domino game in DomiCard. You can create as many dominos as you want in this game before your computer gets burned. Also, "Cubes" can be used to build anything you like, such as a bridge, a gate, or some other buildings.

name: Multicellular
description: Multicellular will take you back in time, to the dawn of life. Build your multicellular organism and combat hunger, the environment, darkness and other organisms. Everything in this new world can kill you, will you be able to survive?

name: Reentry: An Orbital Simulator
description: Do you have what it takes to be an astronaut? Reentry is a realistic space flight simulator based on NASAs space programs; from the first American human spaceflight in Project Mercury, the rendezvous and EVAs of Project Gemini to the Moon landing in Project Apollo.

name: House of Plague 0
description:
House Of Plague 0 is a 2D mini horror games.
Choose your character, explore the building.
Find one of the many exits and escape.
A short adventure which is only possible by careful exploration.

name: Chef: A Restaurant Tycoon Game
description: Chef is a Restaurant Management game in which you create your own character, acquire supreme cooking skills, customize restaurants, design unique menus, and devise innovative recipes with a realistic editor.

name: Pawn of the Dead
description: A 3D game based on chess, in the style of Battle Chess. What makes it a unique game is its mechanic: When a Black (undead) piece captures a White piece, that White piece turns into a Black one!

name: Negative Type
description: Tasked with a simple search and retrieve mission for a missing scientist, what could go wrong? Nate Byrne asked this question, and the answer was simple; everything could go wrong! Success could lead to the use of a powerful weapon while failure could result in a massive outbreak.

name: Valor Time
description: Valor Time is representative of the client family session based multiplayer action RPG of the medieval WASD non-target management system. The game process supports massive battles.

name: Just Dash
description: Can you pass all the chapters? Just Dash!

name: Medical verdict
description: Before you cheerful simulator passing medical examination with realistic graphics and interesting gameplay! Get as many virtual health points as possible in a competitive struggle with your friends!

name: Astrela Starlight
description: Astrela Starlight is an adventure game where the player can explore, interact with various NPCs, complete quests, mine and refine materials, then build new spacecraft and space stations.

name: Retro Snake Adventures
description: It's a unique twist on the Classic Snake Game. It's kinda like snake, but adventure mode.  Collect keys to get through doors, but watch out for your tail and walls.

name: Sanguine Sanctum
description: It desires more. Feed It. Nourish It. Sanguine Sanctum is an atmospheric horror-exploration game with a low-poly, PS1 aesthetic.

name: Vritra: Complete Edition
description:
A challenge from ancient times delivered to gamers. That excitement from the past has returned.
The complete version of Vritra, the 2D fantasy shooting game, is out now!

name: Fury Strike
description: Fury Strike is an 80s-themed 2.5D cel-shaded fighter game created by Full Sail University students in collaboration with Rooster Teeth.

name: Absolute Adventure Zero
description:
Absolute Adventure Zero is a role playing game set in a different (fictional) dimension, 
it's graphics and sound department are inspired by older games of the same genre. 
In this game you fight an insane mage,and his evil beings,to stop their evil plan.

name: Caffeine: Victoria's Legacy
description: A choice-rich, fantasy adventure visual novel in a steampunk victorian alternate reality, where coffee is all that matters.

name: For the Revenge
description:
The world is filled with darkness by the devil. 
The last wizard left, you have to shine the light and defeat the devil to save the world. 
But be careful! As soon as the light is lit, a group of demons will come and attack you. 
Alone, you have to fight against hundreds of thousands of enemies!

name: CreativeDestruction
description: Creative Destruction is a FPS/TPS sandbox survival game that combines Battle Royale with a constructive concept. You will parachute onto a 4*4 km massive map with 13 different enchanted lands. Starting with a special destructor in hand, you must survive a 100 player deathmatch! Come battle in this wonderland and craft your own way to victory now!

name: Newfound Courage
description: You're a young man named Alex who arrives in the cliffside town of Silverpine. Explore the town's many mysteries and meet its colourful townsfolk, while you grow closer to a kind-hearted local named Jake. Can the two of you save the town from the impending doom brewing inside the mysterious Vault?

name: Skautfold: Into the Fray
description: Into the Fray is a fast action-shooter in the vein of Doom and Dark Messiah; using fast combat, reactive environments, and traps. Blast, kick, and dash your way through Rebels and Eldritch creatures to liberate the Isle of Portland; as it becomes consumed by Fog and the horrors therein.

name: Night of the Blood Moon
description: Use the darkness of a blood moon to rise from the nightmares and take back the dream realm! Use unique weapons, grow your power, and destroy the charming creatures of the dream realm. Develop your skills with, unlock pets, and defeat bosses who will challenge your strategy along side your skill.

name: The Longing
description: In utter loneliness, miles below the surface, it is your task to... wait. For 400 days... in real-time.

name: Yemon
description: The ninja apprentice, Yemon, along with the onmyodo master, must stop the yokai from entering through a demon gate and destroying their village. Yemon must now live up to the meaning of his name and become the guardian of the gate.

name: Supaplex Hard
description: Complexity and speed!

name: Invaders! From Outer Space
description: What really happened in 1958? Experience a crazy alien invasion in extraordinary retro action! Can you save the earth from the apocalypse or do the aliens come in peace?

name: Actionpaint VR
description: A fast and powerful paint experience.

name: Where's Baby
description:
"Where's Baby" is an asymmetrical multiplayer game pitting a baby sitter against all odds.
"What is that?!", "Why is what?", "Why is one of the kids a furry?!", "Is that a werewolf?". "Shouldn't their parents have mentioned this?!", "He broke the table, he just touched it and in exploded!".

name: Whispering Flames
description: Whispering Flames is a fantasy visual novel. Neoth, a young prince tired of his troublesome royal duties, meets a curious, cheerful girl. This event turns everything on its head.

name: Symphonics
description: A unique way to compose music in VR by physically manipulating the melodies and beats you write. Interact with your songs in a completely new way.

name: Atlantic Edge
description: Atlantic Edge is a strategic VR brawler for HTC VIVE in which you play a mech pilot tasked with defending a city from an endless onslaught of kaiju. Will you save the city? Or cause as much damage as the kaiju?

name: GrabBag
description:
Test your reflexes and hand-eye coordination in this fast-paced VR game!
Catch items flying past you as you speed down different immersive environments.
Trigger multipliers with consistent streaks for the best score.
Glory goes to those who grab the most!

name: The Adventures of Mr. Fluffykins
description: Join Mr.Fluffykins on his epic adventure to find all of King Barts lost recipes. Explore Caves, Jungles, Frozen Tundras as well as the Wild West. Throw pumpkins, solve puzzles, shoot cannons, and join our royal kitty on an epic adventure.

name: Death Fungeon
description: A puzzle platform game, with both stealth and parkour elements. Use your wits, cunning and agility to escape this deadly prison. Take the stealthy approach, progressing slowly, hiding and staying out of sight. Or utilise your athleticism to wall jump, ledge grab and speed run your way to freedom.

name: Jump and Run: Don't Fall
description: Jump and Run: Don't Fall is a simple but challenging first-person platformer .

name: Clone Adventures
description: Clone Adventures is new type of 2D platform games with a fresh approach to gameplay. Try to control a whole lot of clones and have complete level.

name: In Your Realm
description:
In Your Realm gives an old-school, challenging, RPG roguelike experience with randomized
encounters and a unique combat system.
To beat the game the player needs to plow through every weakness of their personality -
represented in the game as bosses in their respective worlds.

name: Mendel
description: Mendel is a chill sandbox game about growing weird plants from alien genetics.

name: Fly of butterfly
description: Fly, butterfly, fly. Relaxing game for those who do not like stress and like when everything is simple and easy.

name: The Greater Good
description: The Greater Good is a full-blown, classic style turn-based RPG complete with an epic story, optional superbosses, world map, airships, NEW GAME+, and more. Stylized 3D graphics and a unique electronic soundtrack make it look and sound like no other game.

name: Construction Truck Simulator
description: Drive over 15 vehicles, operate large cranes and machines, complete easy and complex objectives and explore an open world environment.

name: Adventure Portal
description: Adventure Portal is a platform that allows players to connect and run their pen and paper role playing campaigns online!

name: Free Throw
description:
A simple game in which you only have to click the screen with your mouse.
There are several unique levels.

name: Brothers in Arms: Kill to Survive
description: Dogs of War: Kill to Survive - A game about the war, where you will play as an ordinary soldier. You will face all the horrors of the war and feel how it is to fight in a modern war.

name: Les 4 Alice: Lorange Journey
description: 3 connected short stories, written in Ren’py, with choices and various endings. Alice Lorange, a young autistic teenager, finds herself trapped against her will in a mysterious house.

name: VR Jogger
description: Get started on the trail to a healthier you with VR Jogger today!
Collection of jokes.

name: Contingency
description: Surviving is the least of your worries. After your cargo ship crashes on a foreign planet, not only will you have to find a way to eat, you'll have to survive the terrors of your fear and stress. Roguelite platforming gameplay will keep you frequently choosing weapon and suit upgrades to best defeat your many demons.

name: Doggo Dig Down
description: Dig down, build up in this casual crafting game about a dog looking for the perfect place to bury a bone.

name: Son.Light.Sleepwalker
description: Turn out the lights, pull up your sheets, don your headphones, and brace yourself for a most memorable, frightening experience. You have a sleepwalking 9 year old son. His psychologist said to never let him awake while sleep walking. Use your Smart Home cams - but don't let him into the light!

name: Grim Earth
description: The Earth's looking a bit Grim, but so would you after 5000 years and countless alien invasions! Grab your spacesuit (the air's not so great any more) and go for an adventure in what is still a beautiful world.

name: Inevitable VR
description: See if you have what it takes to solve the puzzles within game to enable you to retrieve, take control and bring the space station back to a stable condition whilst under pressure.

name: Galaxy Top Wing
description: This is an independent development of casual games, is the experience of virtual reality space shooting game. The player flying in the universe and sitting in the cockpit and observing the magnificent cosmic scenes outside the fighter by the VR, through the meteorite zones chasing and shooting with the enemy fighters in space with their teammates and attacking the enemy's spaceship. Follow up plans also develop planetary exploration, Galaxy roaming, and spaceship wars.

name: Monster Slayers
description: 卡牌与RPG结合的无尽地牢探险之旅！最早融合Roguelike与卡牌的游戏之一。多达14种职业，真人配音+纸娃娃系统，完善的卡牌设计，各类魔物与随机事件等你体验！

name: Divine Miracle Defense
description:
Divine Miracle Defense is an tower defense game with an magic theme and few roguelike which make it very unique.

You have to build an defense line with mages and upgrade them to stay alive as long as possible. when you die, you get a few special points depending on how long you survived. With this points you can upgrade the power of your mages and many other things to stay longer alive.

name: Ambition
description: Ambition is a 2D strategy RPG game that explores a village with teleporters to dangerous dungeons. In this strange and quirky world, battle bosses like a one-eyed turtle with a fancy tophat, a giant centipede that lurks quietly in the desert, and many more!

name: Zniw Adventure
description: Zniw Adventure is a 2D, traditionally animated point and click adventure game with educational content, starring a young, yellow, female dinosaur having all sorts of adventures in the prehistoric land of Polisemia.

name: Port Valley
description: Port Valley is a (not so) classic Point & Click game where a certain choice changes everything. Witness 3 points of view of the same story and find out what's really going on during Port Valley's Election Day!

name: Marbledrome: Crazy Stunt Balls
description:
Original game system, novel, fun and different from any game of racing balls. 
Compete against other players from around the world to get the best time on each track.

name: My Holiday
description: 画风清奇的RPG作品，故事讲述的是一个小学3年僧，随父母回老家的5天假期生活。在老家的小区你会遇到一群性格各异的小盆宇，展开一张并不是很激烈的假期冒险。

name: Never Breakup
description: This is a two-player game where two players are connected by a rope and they need to work together to pass the level. The game includes both action and puzzle, challenge your skills and brain. It should be noted that no matter what the outcome is, don't break up with your partner!

name: Fall
description: Sin descripción

name: Cash Rush
description: Cash Rush is a Shop Game simulator. Create your business from scratch, use decorations to increase your margin, hire new employee and start making the billions you deserve!

name: ABC Paint
description: A VR drawing app as easy as ABC. No clever hologram-menus or impressive lazer-pointer interactions - just You, the brush, palette and an endless canvas. Suitable for any age.

name: Concord
description: Would you look at that. A letter containing the will of your now deceased Great Grand Uncle. How lucky! Did you even have a Great Grand Uncle? Who knows; but this offer is too great to pass up. In the will it states that you have to scrub yourself clean in a shower? Seems kinda strange.

name: Do or Die
description:
Fight against each other in intense VR Battle Royale skirmishes in Do or Die! 
Conquer the battlefield and escape with your life! 
Drop in an island full of weapons to equip, survive until the end or fight to escape alive!

name: Bottle of truth
description: Узнайте историю простого русского парня, который живет в России. Возможно он хотел бы никогда не покидать свое комфортное убежище и не видеть все ужасы улицы, но судьба уготовила ему совсем иные планы и ему предстоит увлекательное приключение.

name: Farjob
description: Delve into a boundless realm of twisting pathways and absurd bosses.

name: Velocity G
description:
Velocity G is a futuristic Zero G, 360 degree tunnel racing game set in the year 2086.

Experience incredible high speed action as you race your way across exiting tracks, each with their own unique characteristics.

Play single player against AI, split-screen with up to 4 players, or offline versus ghost players from all over the world!

name: Yumemonogatari Origin
description: Sin descripción

name: Eight.Domino.Heart
description:
Eight.Domino.Heart is a logic puzzle game of dominoes 🁬 🁶 🁼 
Use your wits to fit every domino together and fill the board!

name: Age of Forays
description: Feel yourself in the role of warrior. Do raids, improve your ship, improve your hero, control your combat unit. Become a part of the great history of the northern kingdom

name: Acid Nimbus
description: manage your ammunition and dodge projectiles. Charge with your bayonet and get the highest score.

name: LoveBug
description: Sleepless nights. Blood, sweat and coffee. Survive your first game jam while developing a game in just under a weekend and maybe, just maybe, in the end of this all, you will find true love!

name: A.D.M: Angels, Demons and Men
description: Angels,Demons And Men(A.D.M) is a difficult apocalyptic hack n slash RPG.Explore the worlds for clues and collect required items.Master combat skills and learn god-like spells,slay various demons and prepare to save the world.

name: Amulet Zero: Optimize
description: 某一天，一觉醒来的朵琳，发现自己正置身于这个陌生的小岛上， 独自在树林里走着，没走多远，她遇上了一个哭得很伤心的女孩子，她叫杰西卡……

name: Punch Pad Workout
description: This is a workout plus memorization game, where the player must punch the pads, in the correct order that each combination is called out, over 3 rounds.

name: Touch Type Tale
description:
A boy is wanted for his nimble fingers by four rivaling dukes and duchesses of a kingdom in turmoil.

Touch Type Tale is a real-time strategy typing game featuring a story rich campaign and online competitive play.
Challenge your friends in a battle of tactics and typing skills!

name: Er-mo
description: Record the buildings in which your dreams appear.

name: Pixel Draw
description: Color by Number - Pixel Draw is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Pixel Coloring has never been this easy!

name: Cortex
description:
The psychedelic tunnel-runner. 
 
"You are a thought. A thought to be born..." 
 
Guide your thought through the labyrinth of the brain, avoid hitting the walls and obstacles, nothing should distract you... 
 
A minimalistic-ambient reflex game with a 60 frames per second flow experienceand the atmospheric music of Tamas Katai. 
 
Cortex is open-source, feel free to learn how to write muti-platform C games here : https://github.com/milgra/cortex

name: Chicken VR
description: Chicken VR is a virtual reality first person chicken simulator. You can teleport around and explore, eating food, drinking water, and laying eggs.

name: Fortified Swiss
description: Fortified Swiss is an immersive tower defense experience featuring a grand campaign that spans across the continent of Fromage. Vast hordes of mice have invaded due to the Mouse King's insatiable desire to hoard the most artisan of cheeses.

name: Tech Corp.
description: Tech Corp. is a game where you try to become the biggest tech company in the world . Your goal is to become the next big shot in the tech industry. The game also takes place through history. Starting in the early 90's and going to present time. You're in charge of creating and designing new Products such as Consoles, Phones, Tablets, and Computers. You are responsible for all aspects of a product from the software, the manufacturing, and the releasing and marketing.

name: Crackpot Despot: Trump Warfare
description:
Your mission is to help reunite Don Flan make it across the border to reunite with his family after being forcibly separated from them under Trump’s disastrous new immigration policy! But it won’t be an easy feat. First you’ll have to make it past Trump’s Border Wall defenses.
Don't miss out on this Presidential Parody of Epic Proportions!

name: Stay or Leave
description: This is an adventure ARPG with great sense of blow.You can collection of stones,wood and straw etc to make the props or equipment you need.You can also take care of the plants of the camp to get food.Maybe you can go fishing quietly,just forget the whole world...Give full play to you!

name: Brick Breaker with Risa
description: Remake of classic Brick Breaker game with level editor and a cute anime girl guide who will make comments about your game-play.

name: Goalkeeper Legend
description: Fulfill your dream of playing as a goalkeeper in the biggest football tournaments!

name: Shudder
description: Shudder is a high speed, twin-stick shooter with one stick and no shooting. Lost in an interdimensional wormhole, absorb powerful cosmic cells to charge up the awesome power of the SHUDDER Drive 9000TM and use it against the onslaught of interstellar Para-Bugs. Shatter Vortex-Cubes and decimate the bio-organic threat to rack up high scores and harvest rare resources to unlock more powerful ships and increase your chances of survival.

name: Urban Lockdown
description: Side scrolling beat em up game featuring digitized characters and a blood soaked action adventure

name: Slay the Dragon
description: Slay the dragon is a turn based roguelike RPG game, where you must kill the dragon.

name: Holiday Escape
description: Holiday Escape is a casual game in which you play a snowman trying to outrun a large snow ball while grabbing as many ornaments and presents as possible to spread holiday cheer.

name: Bunny: The Horror Game
description: There is a terrible bunny in the house.

name: Memetown USA
description: Memetown USA is a short game about saving the world from a dangerous church trying to destroy the universe. Memetown USA may be small in scope, but it makes up for it with intense AAA quality meme material.

name: King of my Castle VR
description:
King of My Castle Vr is a Medieval Cartoonesque Tower Defense in which you will play an archer who must defend the King's Tower. 
 
You can teleport to 5 different locations to defend the city. 
 
A game for the whole family and guaranteed archery sensations!

name: Paws and Soul
description: Paws&Souls is an adventure game about reincarnation. Turn into a wolf, explore a mysterious forest and reveal every secret of your past life!

name: Evemnesis
description: For many years you have been an excellent worker for the system. You have retrieved countless relics and faced hundreds of meaningless challenges. But every explorer has one last mission. You are starting to realize that your final quest inside the cyclical structure is near.

name: Ducks and Gooobers
description: Ducks and Gooobers is a simple Tower Defense game with unique features and gameplay. You can choose between different unique towers and blocks to fight off over a dozen different enemies. Synergy between tower and block will be key to surviving the longest.

name: Unexpected Circumstances
description:
Use WSAD keys to move and mouse to look. It's simple. 
Our fearless hero-androir get stucked into the labyrinth.You are to help him to find the way. You'll come across incessant mazes and you are to overcome it. You'll need a planty of patience to find the way out and don't die on your way. Good Luck on Your journey!

name: Escape: Secret of the Hidden Room - The Collaborator
description: a room escape adventure game that will touch your heart

name: Fruit Tower Defense
description:
Fruit Tower Defense is a strategy video game consistsing of 15 levels across 5 worlds, with each world hand-drawn and designed by a different artist, giving each world a unique feel. 
 
Fruit Tower Defense is ad free and does not contain in-game purchases.

name: SpaceBall in Cube
description: SpaceBall in Cube is a game for those who want to relax from shooters, racing, arcade, etc. The game is suitable for people who like to play the argument, since the idea of the game is to recruit space spectacles. One more name to represent the game - cosmic bowling in the cube.

name: Savage Vessels
description: Rogue-like 2D space shooter with pixel-art, physics and hard survival.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them, the game is set in the Chinese People's War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression off the air of the North Eastern Province.

name: Adome
description:
ADOME is sci-fi action, platforms and first-person exploration in which history has great weight.
Thanks to the elaborate parkour system, you will enjoy an agile gameplay with fast and dynamic fights.

name: WASDead
description: WASDead is a hardcore action platformer where you assume control over the character R in his quest to collect MONEY. Why? Because money makes you feel good!

name: Poltergeist Treasure
description: Poltergeist Treasure is an absurdist comedy point & click adventure game following Sir Typhil of Creulor as he attempts to escape a haunted forest.

name: Garrison Gauntlet
description: Garrison Gauntlet is an oldschool-style action-platformer where you play through over four stages of intense challenges! A little robot that is to serve as nothing more than as one of the many robotic minions owned by the evil tyrant, Garrison, it realizes that being in such a position is no rewarding task. As the robot itself, you must stop Garrison's forces from the inside before they take over the world!

name: Torn Asunder
description: Tear off their limbs, use them as weapons, conquer the environment, destroy the primevals, SURVIVE THE ONSLAUGHT.

name: Caramba
description: In this game, you have to train your memory and find the treasures of the captain.

name: The Orcs Strike Back!
description: Find your inner Orc, and fight the oppressive, privileged, and bigoted elves. Grow your tribe, seize their weapons, and take back your homelands!

name: Lord VS Nas Vai
description: The game is set in 2145, when people went to shelters and on the ground there were only reasonable drones..

name: Kitten and food: adventure park
description:
Help to collect all the food for a gluttonous cat. Beware of collision with all kinds of obstacles in the form of birds, stakes and high-rise buildings.
The game features 60 levels with two bonus, excellent graphics and fun background music. Play and have fun with the game.

name: Battle royale simulator
description: Battle royale simulator lets you simulate and control a battle royale game. You can choose the amount of player (like 600 at max), game speed, air drops, where the storm will close and just some really cool things

name: Run, Run, Monsters!
description: Plunge into the world of puzzles, monsters and adventures!..

name: The Wanderings Dragon
description: The game takes place in the distant past, when the dragons lived on the ground, and people hid in the castles...

name: The Odd Battle
description: A sarcastic fight game about the world with the world.

name: Mahjongg The Ultimate Collection 2
description: The ultimate collection of Mahjongg games features 15 game variations, 30 tile sets, 150 backgrounds, and 125 tile layouts.

name: Fred the Fraud
description: This is an adventure based game with multiple levels and made to keep the player happy and not raged. This game is a game about a person named Fred who has deceived his fried Joe, and in order to complete the game the player must make the right decisions to make everyone happy or you can just stuff up their lives lol.

name: Gravity Leo
description: Gravity Leo is a 2D platformer based on interesting mechanics and features, the main one of them is the use of gravity.

name: Prank Masters
description: A romantic comedy otome visual novel game where you play as a heroine prankster.

name: Lava Pool
description: Lava Pool is FPS arcade. The game consists of levels, each level is a small location (room), where you need to find an exit.

name: Drymir Cave under Richmordnom
description: Drymir Cave under Richmordnom is a hardcore indie project and RPG elements, with a third-person view. Events which unfold in a small area, not far from the native village of the main character.

name: Cat doesn't like banana
description: Cat doesn't like banana - a dynamic game in which you need to get a fat cat to the very top, away from these eerie bananas, which he does not like so much..

name: BattleBlade
description: BattleBlade is a 2D Fighter game with Bullet Hell elements featuring a story-based campaign about Gods and Demons fighting for Earth. Read visual novel style dialogue to discover the truth! BattleBlade also features a local multiplayer versus mode allowing you to battle your friends!

name: Swamp Jump
description: A puzzle game in which you have to collect fruits and berries on dangerous stones that go under water. Collect them all and try not to be trapped!

name: Land of Puzzles: Castles
description: In Land of Puzzles: Castles the king and queen need your help. To avoid war the king has accepted a challenge of puzzles to solve. He needs you to solve 15 sets of challenging puzzles and help him secure the kingdom.

name: City Blocks
description: City Blocks is a puzzle / deck-building game. Place city blocks so their pipes is aligned and earn new ones as you proceed through the game! A genre-blending game that removes micro management for a more puzzle-like approach to city planning.

name: Deadly Wheels
description: "Deadly Wheels" - simulator of the race for survival.

name: Test Subject 901
description: Trudge through haunting halls and desolate rooms, teleport through the darkness and hide in the shadows as you plan your escape. Feel your heart race as your doom looms ever closer. Find a way out before your fate is sealed.

name: Boom Bits
description: Boom Bits is a single-player shoot-em-up set in the distant future where humans have been forced to leave the planet. You must protect the cargo and get to the launch site.

name: Dojini
description: Dojini is a 2d platformer game where you control two characters at the same time. After the Dojini had his body and mind split into two different dinos after a wizard put a curse on him for eating his apples

name: Project Reset
description: Play as a boy who got back from a 1 month vacation and has returned to school, only to find that he meets 4 new friends, and gets into a new hobby! Meet all 4 of these characters in Project Reset, a free visual novel!

name: Boons Farm
description: A casual shoot'm dead endless waved zombie game, upgrade weapons and compete to get the highest score.

name: Polygone
description: local-coop / local-multiplayer twin-stick shooter

name: Pottis Dream Forge
description: Pottis Dream Forge is a text-based RPG that aims to recapture the days where untalented developers could publish a game and still be popular.

name: Aether Drift
description: Aether Drift is an Arena-Based Bullet Hell Arcade game with an emphasis on speed and intensity. Fight your friends in intense Multiplayer battles, or work together to defeat Mobius's army! The game's endless Arcade mode ramps up difficulty over time, and challenges and cheatcodes keep things fresh and exciting!

name: Journalism class
description:
Ashley returned to the university after her expulsion. She lives in a hostel with a roommate. In the classroom she finds a new girlfriend, with whom she thinks for a long time about creating relationships. Is it necessary for her? 
Dive into the world of the main character and learn all her secrets.

name: Midnight Ghost Hunt
description: A chaotic multiplayer hide-and-seek game. Possess seemingly harmless objects as Ghosts or chase them down as Hunters before the clock strikes midnight!

name: People Cu3ed
description: Join your cuboidal friends as you represent the 3rd dimension in the 'Interdimensional Games' - a VR game like no other - you'll find yourself leaving your boring human shape behind!

name: Zettavolt Trigger
description: The security robots of Zettavolt Inc. have been hacked and are bent on tearing down the company from the inside out. Safe from hacking due to his A.I., it's up to Trigger to stop the rampaging robots before they ruin the fiscal year.

name: Gallows Choice
description: A classic for great fun, a virtual and improved gallows game!

name: KeepShopkeeping
description: Shop, craft and sell for profit to improve your crafting shop. Experience the thrill of managing your own shop in the RPG World. Fight monsters and meet new townspeople. KeepShopkeeping offers you, all of this and more!

name: Here Nya
description: The best game in the world!

name: Cyclones Playground
description: Perfection County has been destroyed by a massive amount of tornadoes. The N.D.P.T. S.W.D. has been sent to Study and stop the record amount of tornadoes.

name: Checkmate!
description:
A classic for great fun, a virtual and improved chess game! 
Protect you king from a checkmate!

name: Heavy Dreams
description: A boy. A laptop. A dream. In this game, you search through a young teenager's laptop, trying to find out his story. Solve hidden puzzles and read between the lines that he wrote in your quest to unravel the mystery of Jay Zhang.

name: Survivor in Summer
description: Try to keep 3 people surviving the plane crash

name: Joydoor
description: Joydoor is the main character who got to the world from which he needs to get out. You have to help him. In the game you are waiting for opponents who will disturb you - be careful, because you have only 1 life. You need to look for the keys to get out of this terrible world.

name: Misfit
description: In MISFIT, you control one of several cyborgs in a multiplayer shooting arena, battle over objectives, take down other players, and achieve victory.

name: Beast Modon
description: In this arcade style shoot em up that lets you earn more punishing difficulties, you are Sylvester, a hero pilot in his glory days turned space janitor on a space station. After an attack on said post, it is up to him to retrieve the fabled Fang Shards. Turn your Beast Mode on, you're going to need it.

name: Punk-Ex
description: Punk-Ex is a fast-paced Land, Air and Space shooter with more than 30 Single-player missions. Play as 'BOOM', a ex-professor that seeks to revenge his dead family.

name: Lucid Path
description:
Lucid Path is a dungeon crawler RPG with simple and pleasant game mechanics that focuses on progressing in a dungeon and upgrading your character 
 
Tired of your miserable life you have decided to set off on an adventure. Luckily for you, the village you have come across has a problem with a dungeon. Now you must only solve it... 
 
Features: 
  -Turn-based battles against dangerous monsters for their treasures 
  -Quests and work that can be done by playing one of five different mini games 
  -Many different weapons, armors and spells 
  -An interesting story 
  -A talking Cactus!

name: Lauren's visit
description: Lauren's visit is a new Visual Novel by Hanae Novels. Main character young woman Jessie is a lesbian. This story is about lesbian couple and their old friend. Find out what adventures did they have.

name: Lessons learned
description: Two young school teachers are in love. Find out about their love story!

name: Knocking on her door
description: Young bussines woman is in love with her boss. This story is about mutual secrets, deep lesbian love and some sexy details...

name: Legend of Assassin: Egypt
description: An exciting platform game about the adventures of an assassin in Ancient Egypt. Jump over obstacles and collect crystals, and try to survive in this adventure.

name: Sp!te
description: Sp!te is set in post apocalyptic times where nuclear war is going on throughout the globe, with zombies and monsters running everywhere! Sp!te is a wave based survival game. The waves go up to 25! If you can get to 26 you have beat one of the levels. there are currently 7 levels to choose from. all sorts of ammo, health and bomb spawns, and weapons to choose from throughout the maps.

name: Soul Rebellion
description: In the lands of Armelia, 10 people have been possessed by the soul of ancient heroes to participate in a evil game. Release your own soul in this Action-Adventure game.

name: FanTris
description:
FanTris = Fan Art + Tetris !!! 
And the game chosen in this edition of FanTris was Miner Ultra Adventures, this game was created with the help of many fans around the world, using the strategy and intelligence, you need to destroy the haters to enjoy a fan art of the Miner Ultra Universe !!!

name: Skywriter
description: Fly your plane and connect the dots with smoke trails.

name: Submerged: VR Escape the Room
description: Trapped inside a room filling with water, you will decipher secrets and tools to aid your escape. Hold your breath and dive for answers within a submarine deep below the ocean.

name: Special Warfare
description: Special Warfare is a modern war theme multiplayer online FPS shooting game, high quality, beautiful light and shadow effects, 6 camps (Delta Force, Mercenary, SEAL, Army, SWAT, Terrorists）, more than 40 modern weapons, and experience the hearty battle with players from all over the world.

name: Happy Block
description:
A different Tetris game. 
The color blocks falls from the top of the screen. 
Move it to left or right,or rotate it,or adjust the array. 
Take the same color block together. 
If there are same color block more than 4 in horizontal 
or vertical, they will change to gold coins.the big mouth will eat gold coins for you,Your record 
will increase. 
if you can't put the block quickly they will pile up. If it piles up to the top of the screen, the game will fail.

name: Touch Down Football Solitaire
description: Do you love football? Are you a master of Solitaire? Are you up for an adventure? Join the Solitaire City Juggernauts for the upcoming football championship and let the world know that you are more than a simple rookie! Master numerous levels of Solitaire, follow Frank and his fun story about the world of football and become the next champion!

name: Monster Farm
description: Here is a real farm monsters in which you have to grow your own monsters, developing them to more advanced creatures. Build the most profitable farm in the district!

name: Navyblue and the Spectrum Killers
description: Jump, Shoot and Dash throughout the city, choosing which crisis to solve first as you gain new powers and fight your way through legions of evil robots and thugs as you try to save the world!

name: Artificial Mansion
description: When Reuben inherits his uncle's mansion, the last thing he expects is to find are sentient life-sized dolls that are capable of moving and talking. As if that isn't shocking enough, one of the dolls is a psychopathic killer who has her sights set on him! Will he survive or become another victim?

name: Construction Charlie
description: Collect items and defeat enemies in this action-packed platformer! Construction Charlie jumps from between platforms over many detailed environments. Even after the main game is finished, a detailed level editor puts the power to create in your hands, allowing you to build your own experience!

name: Kentucky Robo Chicken
description: Help the Robo Chicken get the stolen light bulbs back!

name: Mars Power Industries
description: Congratulations on your first tiny colony! Taking the post of Plumber/Electrician must be tough out there, we know how lonely it might get and you probably miss your family. Don’t worry! We provide music. No silence in space. Studies show employees exhibit high degree of stress when surrounded by silence, so it is to be avoided. The pleasant soothing sounds of distant synth music will calm you right away… and continue calming you through the years… Imagine a spaceship slowly moving through endless black pudding, with no one on board but you and the lights. But the lights are broken. That’s the point – please fix the lights!

name: BattleRise: Kingdom of Champions
description:
Tactically Enchanting. Magically Unlimited.

BattleRise: Kingdom of Champions is a collectible, role-playing game combining gripping turn-based battles, an engaging story-mode, and endless dungeons (and with even more features planned for the future). BattleRise is inspired by fan-favorite, classic, fantasy-themed games, yet has its own look and feel.

In the world of Eos, an immeasurably powerful creature and his henchmen threaten all the realms of the living. Your task in this epic and perilous quest to save the world is to unite brave, foolhardy, battle-hardened warriors in an epic struggle against these ancient evils threatening to annihilate all of creation.

Experience a world teeming with adventure and evil
Encounter other Champions in the arena
Fight through endless dungeons to retrieve legendary loot
Craft and customize powerful Artifacts
Strategize on and off the battlefield to vanquish opponents
And seize rich rewards!

Rise up to the many challenges that BattleRise has to offer in the Kingdom of Champions!

Scour for legendary loot and epic bonuses in shrines, and face Tiamat’s heralds on the paths of the treacherous dungeons. Choose your Champions and strategy wisely to get through all the challenges and prevail.

All these choices bring benefits and consequences that directly influence the story and the progress of that specific run, changing your experience. Each step you decide changes the outcome in some way.

You can play a single Dungeon Run many times over before you get through every possible combination, allowing you to discover new depths of the lore every time you play.

Clash with others in the gripping synchronous PVP battles for one sole purpose - the taste of victory! Step into the grandest arena of all and let your name be known among other players.

Unite and rise with Champions from a wide range of iconic backgrounds. Choose from a host of formidable factions such as sanctified Seraphim, Verdant Offspring, and Void Lords. Explore dozens of Champions bringing unique skills and stories. Many more Champions are planned over time.

Every single Champion brings something different to the table. It is up to you to learn what each of them does best and find ways to combine their skills and abilities in the optimum way. Many Champions have built-in synergy with each other, allowing them to work as a team seamlessly.

There are many permutations of team composition to cater to your preferred playstyle. Will you rush your opponent to bring them down before they even get a turn? Or do you enjoy the battle and prefer to take your time? The choice is yours!

The world of Eos is full of legendary weapons, ancient artifacts, and magic spells!
Find the treasure and experiment enabling viable Champions with your collectibles. The artifacts can enhance their powers in various ways. Play and seek the best setup for your Champions. The possibilities are many. The choices are yours!

name: Kyuukyuu Sosei
description:
Kyuukyuu Sosei is a Simulation game for the Xbox 360, developed by SmileBoom and published by Microsoft Game Studios, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Jun Classic C.C. & Rope Club
description: Jun Classic C.C. & Rope Club is a continuation of the T&E Soft New 3D Golf Simulation series. It is played at the Jun Classic Country Club and the Rope Club in Tochigi Prefecture. Unlike most other games in this series, this one offers two golf courses each of which have three different routes of varying difficulty. The game itself is visually similar to other T&E Soft golf games released around the same time as it runs on what is largely the same engine. Compared to the fixed viewpoint camera of the predecessors, this game features a cinematic camera, along with optional free roaming "golf cart" mode that can be activated from the menu.

description: A space based MMORPG with a focus on ‘dogfighting’ style action and exploration. Features a huge array of ships, imaginative weapons and ship upgrades with more being added all the time. Explore the galaxy, fight other players, form your own organisations, mine asteroids to craft new items, loot rare weapons from alien races, and more...

name: Iter Vehemens Ad Necem
description: Fellow adventurer, turn back while you can! For here begins the roguelike Iter Vehemens ad Necem, a Violent Road to Death. If you choose to travel along it, you will dive into countless exciting adventures to gain items of great magic, attain powerful equipment made of mysterious materials, bathe in the blessings of mighty gods and recruit loyal allies of various shapes and sizes. Unfortunately, along the way you will also often be dangerously injured, poisoned, catch numerous diseases, lose several limbs and transform into manifold different kinds of pitiful creatures in the darkest depths of hostile dungeons. And, at the end of the road, you are bound to perish in a most gruesome and painful way. Don't say we didn't warn you.

NeuroSlicers is a highly tactical cyberpunk RTS that turns the genre on it’s head.
